data.what_is:
Marketing automation software that does what you need done: email marketing, forms, landing pages, lead nurturing, lead scoring, surveys, assessments, and more - with the #1 inbox deliverability in the business - getting more of your emails to the people you want to see them.  

We are honored to have recently received a Customer Service Excellence Award - because we love working with our customers to achieve the success they envision.

Are you ready to leave ordinary marketing in the dust and get better results?  It's time to market differently.
data.product_description: Provides marketing automation and online marketing tools to small and midsize businesses interested in taming the internet and harnessing it.

pricing_plans.plan_name: Standard Plans - Pay Per Email sent
pricing_plans.plan_description: Unlimited leads, pay per email sent.

pricing_plans.plan_name: Standard Plans - Pay per Active* lead
pricing_plans.plan_description:
Up to 50,000 leads, unlimited emails. 
*Active leads are those who are reachable (haven't opted out and email address is not bad).
Inquire for your volume and limits.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 12 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 10 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 10 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 11 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 12 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 19 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 19 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 19 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 19 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 18 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 16 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 15 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 14 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 18 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 18 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 18 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 17 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 18 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 18 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 15 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 15 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Based on 17 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Based on 16 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Based on 16 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 18 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 17 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 13 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 13 Genoo reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

initial_reviews.review_title: Genoo is the perfect solution for small-to-medium-sized businesses
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Genoo?
I like the ability to edit web content and manage email marketing campaigns all in one interface. I also like how easy the interface is to navigate and how fast their support gets back to you with answers. You can create email templates and then organize them into groups and automate them in a campaign. Their analytics are also getting more sophisticated as I have used the product. They are constantly working to make the product the best it can be!

What do you dislike about Genoo?
Weak lead nurturing Simplistic lead scoring Ugly terminology, e.g email blasts

Recommendations to others considering Genoo:

initial_reviews.review_title: Genoo and Direct Marketing in the New Age
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Genoo?
One of my integrated marketing approaches is to drive prospects to my company website and engage them to download rich, valuable content. Genoo gives me an easy, yet comprehensive platform to accomplish this through directed eMail campaigns. Robust capabilities enable me to maintain a large database of contacts and prospects that are segmented by SIC/NAICS codes.  I can further slice and dice my database using a range of other filters that I've defined, such as titles, industry, application, etc.. This allows me to create very focused nurturing campaigns with targeted messages that lead prospects through the sales continuum. I also value the  scoring capabilities and qualification of prospects for automated delivery of leads to my CRM.  Extensive reporting capabilities give me the ability to track campaign performance, ROI, and website activities via range of dimensions.

What do you dislike about Genoo?
There's not much to dislike about Genoo.

Recommendations to others considering Genoo:
If you're looking for a very comprehensive eMarketing solution that's priced right, easy to use, and has the key features and functions of the more expensive platforms, Genoo is your solution.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Genoo?
Coming in with zero experience, I helped pull an entire website together using Genoo. It was easy for me to pick up due to an intuitive user interface and anytime I had questions or got snagged with an issue, Genoo support was there helping me through it every step of the way. Being a beginner in the marketing space, Genoo has really helped me be successful.

What do you dislike about Genoo?
It's hard to find anything negative to say, but if I had to it would be that Genoo has so many capabilities and funcationalities that it can be overwhelming at times.

Recommendations to others considering Genoo:
It is definitely a powerful marketing tool that can be used by beginners or professionals that have been in the marketing space for a while. There are new capabilities that are being rolled out all of the time, like the blog functionality! Others considering Genoo can look forward to ongoing enhancements.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent Product.  Great Support.  Exceptional Value.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Genoo?
As a Genoo customer for the past year I can honestly say that it has changed the way we think, and do, marketing.  I used to joke that we have more enthusiasm than expertise.  But with the tools and support we get from Genoo we were quickly performing like experts - with the results to prove it!  With a great set of features, ease of use, and unmatched servic, Genoo has exceeded our expectations in every aspect.

What do you dislike about Genoo?
Nothing.  New features and enhancements are constantly being added, but the staff and tutorials do a great job of keeping us up to date.  I'm hoping for a next level ERP integration (Lumens/B2B) soon.  :)

Recommendations to others considering Genoo:
I've tried other eMarketing services and in my opinion there is no comparison.  Genoo has been like having a professional marketing consultant working with us the whole way!

Genoo gives me an easy, yet comprehensive platform to accomplish this through directed eMail campaigns. Robust capabilities enable me to maintain a large database of contacts and prospects that are segmented by SIC/NAICS codes.  I can further slice and dice my database using a range of other filters that I've defined, such as titles, industry, application, etc.. Extensive reporting capabilities give me the ability to track campaign performance, ROI, and website activities via range of dimensions.

There's not much to dislike about Genoo.

Recommendations to others considering Genoo:
If you're looking for a very comprehensive eMarketing solution that's priced right, easy to use, and has the key features and functions of the more expensive platforms, Genoo is your solution.
